dt: {bc}a phosphorylated nucleotide C{inf}10{/inf}H{inf}16{/inf}N{inf}5{/inf}O{inf}13{/inf}P{inf}3{/inf} composed of adenosine and three phosphate groups that supplies energy for many biochemical cellular processes by undergoing enzymatic hydrolysis especially to ADP

shortdef: a phosphorylated nucleotide C10H16N5O13P3 composed of adenosine and three phosphate groups that supplies energy for many biochemical cellular processes by undergoing enzymatic hydrolysis especially to ADP —called also adenosine triphosphate
